title: Basis Quick Dry Long Sleeve
body_html:
Crafted from a moisture-wicking, quick-drying semi-perforated fabric, the Basis boasts an impressive UPF rating of 50+. Its 4-way stretch and performance-oriented fit ensure durability and sun protection, making it suitable for beachside activities as well as epic long session on the water. 

Features:

  • UPF 50+ protection from the sun’s rays.
  • 4-way stretch quick dry material.
  • Thumb hole sleeve providing stay in place performance.
  • Performance comfort fit.

title: RE Foot Strap Replacement Hardware Kit
body_html:
Replacement footstrap hardware pack for all Ride Engine straps. Package Includes:

- 4 x Phillips head footstraps screws. M6 x 23mm self-tapping screws
- 4 x Phillips head footstraps screws. M6 x 22mm machine screws
- 4 x washerx

title: Hyperlock Rope Conversion Kit
body_html:
Seeking absolute freedom? The Sliding Rope Conversion Kit for the Hyperlock system offers enhanced maneuverability, allowing smoother directional changes while riding waves. It enables riders to effortlessly engage in toe side riding and facilitates mastery in hydrofoiling. Equipped with a mini-loop connection, extended slider, and stainless-steel ring for increased durability, this kit ensures a seamless experience.

Sizing:

  • Small: 8" Spreader Bars
  • Large: 10" Spreader bars

Features

  • 5mm dyneema flying line cored rope.
  • 5mm dyneema mini-loop.

title: Hyperlock Closed Metal Loop Replacement
body_html:
For those seeking the utmost secure connection between the chicken loop and harness, the Hyperlock Closed Metal Loop is the answer. It eradicates any chance of false hooking or accidental unhooking. Made from durable 8mm steel and engineered with optimal geometry for all chicken loops, it’s easy to install and ensures reliable performance.

Features

  • 8mm stainless steel loop.
  • Pre-curved loop geometry.

title: Hyperlock Windsurf Metal Hook Replacement
body_html:
Harnesses equipped with the Ride Engine Hyperlock feature top-tier performance and comfort. With a simple transition to the Hyperlock Windsurf Metal Hook, tailored for windsurfing, you unlock the benefits of effortless entry and exit, along with the most intuitive and functional on-the-fly harness adjustment available.

Features

  • 8mm stainless steel hook.
  • Windsurf specific hook geometry.

title: Hyperlock Spreader Bar Replacement
body_html:
Original part replacement for the Hyperlock spreader bar. Hyperlock is ensuring seamless and highly adjustable integration with Hyperlock ratchets, this configuration offers a completely new level of harness-to-rider interaction and on the fly precise harness tension adjustment.

Features

  • Wide surface area design.
  • Thumb screw ladder adjustment for optimized, perfect fit.
  • Thermoformed EVA spreader bar pad.
  • Easy aftermarket conversion to closed metal loop, sliding rope
    configuration or windsurf hook geometry.

title: Hyperlock Spreader Bar Replacement
body_html:

title: Barrier Surf Impact Cap
body_html:
You gotta protect your head—period—from impact and the sun. How? Enter our Barrier Soft Helmet, which deftly and stylishly provides multiple levels of unobtrusive protection at an ultralight weight. From afar the Barrier Soft Helmet looks like a surf hat: perforated ear holes, stiff brim, chinstrap, low profile. Up close, however, you’ll notice the 2D laminated EVA protection pads that’ll save your head from the glancing blow of a wayward foil or board.

Features

  • Lycra 2D laminated thermoformed EVA protection • Minimal-water-absorbing materials
  • Close performance fit
  • Easy chin strap adjustment

title: Lyte Hyperlock Harness
body_html: The weight of equipment often serves as a key performance indicator in dynamic water sports. This concept serves as the driving force behind the design of the Lyte harness, renowned as one of the lightest options available, whether dry or wet. By leveraging advancements in material science, the Lyte utilizes materials that offer unparalleled support, comfort, and performance without water absorption during use. Notable features include Curv® composite hard-shell technology, the Cell-Lock thermoformed body interface, and the innovative Hyperlock spreader bar system – all packaged in a sub-1KG configuration for a size medium. It’s the ideal choice for riders conscious of shaving grams.

title: Elite Type 2 Hyperlock Harness
body_html: Featuring the cutting-edge design and engineering found in the Elite Series of harnesses, the Type 2 harness combines a distinctive composite Step-2 hard-shell construction. This construction provides increased torsional flex while preserving superior lumbar lock support derived from biometric data. Complete with the revolutionary Hyperlock spreader bar system and Ride Engine’s renowned craftsmanship, including closed-cell Fusion foam and a full neoprene comfort wrap, the Elite Type-2 is perfect for riders seeking a liberated feel for technical freestyle and hydrofoil or aggressive kite surfing sessions.

title: Elite Carbon Type 1 Webbing Connect Harness
body_html: We acknowledge the presence of steadfast traditionalists who prioritize high performance and optimal fit in harnesses with a traditional webbing configuration. With this in mind, we are pleased to introduce the Elite Carbon Type 1, designed specifically in a webbing configuration. Featuring the 12K Carbon Step-2 hard-shell, fully enveloped in a neoprene liner and internal closed- cell Fusion foam, the Elite Carbon Type 1 offers the same meticulous attention to biometric data shaping and scientific fit as its Hyperlock counterpart, all within a webbing-based design. With the inclusion of the TRAD spreader, this harness sets new standards that exceed traditional expectations.

title: Elite Carbon Type 1 Hyperlock Harness
body_html: Presenting the latest breakthrough in harness technology and design, meticulously redesigned from the foundation. The Elite Carbon Type 1 boasts the revolutionary Hyperlock spreader bar system, reshaping the perspective and interaction for kiteboarders and windsurfers. The 12K carbon STEP-2, the next evolution of the Elite hard shell, enhances comfort and fit through biometrically derived shaping on all axes. With an upgraded ergonomic Fusion closed-cell foam padding configuration, we’ve eliminated excess material without compromising on comfort and support. Remarkably lightweight at just 1KG for a size medium, the new Elite stands as a true masterpiece of innovation for riders looking for the highest level of support that complements every riding style.

title: Trad Spreader Fixed Kite Hook
body_html: This TRADitional-style spreader bar, designed to complement harnesses with webbing connections, integrates modern performance improvements. These enhancements include pre-curved stabilization wings that establish a direct link between the hook and harness. Additionally, it features the Mega Pad, a thermoformed EVA spreader pad for enhanced comfort. Moreover, it showcases the largest and most durable 8mm diameter stainless steel hook on the market, providing unmatched durability.

title: Trad Spreader Fixed Kite Hook
body_html: This TRADitional-style spreader bar, designed to complement harnesses with webbing connections, integrates modern performance improvements. These enhancements include pre-curved stabilization wings that establish a direct link between the hook and harness. Additionally, it features the Mega Pad, a thermoformed EVA spreader pad for enhanced comfort. Moreover, it showcases the largest and most durable 8mm diameter stainless steel hook on the market, providing unmatched durability.

title: Trad Spreader Windsurf Hook
body_html: Leveraging all the high-performance attributes of the TRAD kite spreader, including the stabilization wings and thermoformed EVA Mega spreader pad, alongside the incorporation of a windsurf-specific geometry and an 8mm hook - the largest and most durable hook currently offered in the market.

title: Trad Spreader Windsurf Hook
body_html: Leveraging all the high-performance attributes of the TRAD kite spreader, including the stabilization wings and thermoformed EVA Mega spreader pad, alongside the incorporation of a windsurf-specific geometry and an 8mm hook - the largest and most durable hook currently offered in the market.

title: Trad Spreader Sliding Rope
body_html: While the initial users of rope spreader bars aimed to enhance their wave riding abilities by enabling more aggressive directional shifts and facilitating easier toe side riding, the advantages of a sliding rope have now extended to hydrofoilers striving to perfect new maneuvers, as well as freeriders who desire complete hook liberation and a secure connection, free from concerns about accidental unhooking or false hooks.

title: Trad Spreader Sliding Rope
body_html: While the initial users of rope spreader bars aimed to enhance their wave riding abilities by enabling more aggressive directional shifts and facilitating easier toe side riding, the advantages of a sliding rope have now extended to hydrofoilers striving to perfect new maneuvers, as well as freeriders who desire complete hook liberation and a secure connection, free from concerns about accidental unhooking or false hooks.

title: Solar Shield Surfboard Bag
body_html:
Experience superior protection and convenience with our ultralight, padded cover designed to safeguard your valuable blade from UV damage. Featuring a full 5mm closed cell padding on both top and bottom, an expandable tail for fin accommodation, and a durable T-Plus material shell, this cover ensures your board stays waxed and free from shatter dings.

Features

  • T-Plus material providing UV protection
  • 5mm closed cell foam top and bottom protection • Side mounted haul handle
  • Expanding tail section to accommodate fins
  • Materials
  • T-Plus tarpaulin
  • Marine grade zipper
  • Closed cell foam

Sizes

  • 172cm x 56cm (5’6” x 22”)
  • 202cm x 59cm (6’6” x 23”)

*Both can accommodate boards up to 3” thick

body_html:
Hard rails, thin noses, and lightweight constructions are all prone to damage and all are found in high performance pocket kite foil boards. Slipping your board in a Solar Shield will give you a piece of mind when transporting from your house to the beach.

Features

  • T-Plus tarpaulin
  • Marine grade zipper
  • Hook and loop mast slot
  • Side placement haul handle
  • Closed cell foam
  • Materials
  • T-Plus tarpaulin
  • Marine grade zipper

title: RE_Serve SeaFarer Coffin
body_html:
An ultimate gear-hauling solution! The Seafarer Coffin bag stands out as the epitome of versatility in the collection, catering to both traveling kiteboarders and wakeboarders alike. Offering ample room to accommodate large twin boards, foil boards, foils, and even many blunt nose strapless surfboards, it ensures you have space to spare for essential kites, bars, and accessories needed for your destination.

Features

  • P/F 420D INVISIBLE LATTICE PUZX 2 58 material for superior strength to weight ratio • Reduced wheeled chassis for easy rolling at less weight
  • Large top compartment opening for easy packing
  • External small item pocket
  • Side compression straps
  • Internal, adjustable webbing load stabilization straps • Interior and exterior small item storage
  • Strategically placed haul handles
  • Padded internal board divider

Materials

  • 10mm PE closed cell foam bottom, top and sidewalls
  • P/F 420D INVISIBLE LATTICE PUZX 2 58 nylon shell
  • Heavy-duty YKK marine grade zippers

Sizes

  • 162cm x 46cm x 24cm

title: RE_Serve Wing Travel Coffin
body_html:
Crafted for contemporary wing boards, this coffin travel bag ensures your prized deck arrives at its destination unscathed. The Wing Board Travel Coffin boasts a wide-body wheeled chassis, effortlessly maneuvering through airports, hotels, and the trail to the beach with the resilience of an off road race truck. Featuring robust 360-degree padding, it provides comprehensive protection for all your gear, while a full-length heavy-duty zipper facilitates easy packing and unpacking. Additionally, a spacious internal pocket accommodates your wings or foils for added care. Dual mesh pockets at the nose and tail are perfect for storing wetsuits, sun protection, and other soft items, securely in place even during TSA luggage inspections, along with ensuring extra protection where it’s needed most for your board.

Features

  • P/F 420D INVISIBLE LATTICE PUZX 2 58 material for superior strength to weight ratio
  • Wide body rolling chassis
  • Full length heavy duty YKK marine grade zipper
  • Easy access external small item pocket
  • Large internal pockets for wings or foil components
  • Strategically placed haul handles 

Materials 

  • 10mm PE closed cell foam bottom, top and sidewalls • P/F 420D INVISIBLE LATTICE PUZX 2 58 nylon shell
  • Heavy-duty YKK marine grade zippers 

Sizes 

  • 152cm x 69cm x 25cm (4’11” x 27” x 9 3⁄4 ”)
  • 178cm x 74cm x 25cm (5’10” x 29” x 9 3⁄4”)

title: RE_Serve Surf Travel Coffin
body_html:
Streamlining travel has become increasingly important, and the Surf Travel Coffin simplifies this process effectively. Offering generous space to pack according to your destination’s requirements, it significantly reduces weight with its side-wheeled design and RE-Serve material. Planning an adventurous kite surfing expedition? You’ll find ample space for 2 boards, a 3-kite quiver, bars, and a few wetsuits for added protection. If you’re checking off your bucket list with a surf-focused trip, simply slide in 3 boards along with all the essentials.

Features

  • P/F 420D INVISIBLE LATTICE PUZX 2 58 material for superior strength to weight ratio
  • Side mount wheel design for easy cross airport transport while reducing chassis weight
  • Internal, adjustable webbing load stabilization straps
  • Interior small item pockets for organization

Materials

  • 10mm PE closed cell foam bottom, top and sidewalls • P/F 420D INVISIBLE LATTICE PUZX 2 58 nylon shell
  • Heavy-duty YKK marine grade zippers

Sizes

  • 195cm x 56cm x 18cm (6’4” x 22” x 7”) 
  • 227cm x 61 cm x 18cm (7’4” x 24’ X 7”)

body_html:

The Ride Engine Golf Coffin accommodates a twin board up to 150cm and foil boards up to 42cm wide. With ample space for a 3-kite quiver and essentials like a harness and bar, you might just pass as the next tour pro if the agent plays along.

Sizes

title: Solar Shield Wing Foil Bag
body_html:
Your wing foil board holds a significant place in your investments, alongside your mountain bike and quite conceivably your car! Safeguarding your high-performance craft should be of equal importance, ensuring your board serves you well over time. The Solar Shield Wing Foil Bag is an ideal daily driver, shielding against awkward knocks and impacts, while also blocking the harsh UV rays that can cause fading and deterioration of finishes. With its long hook and loop mast slot, you can keep the foil in place for transportation, accommodating all available foil placements.

Features

  • T-Plus material providing UV protection
  • 5mm closed cell foam top, bottom and sidewall protection • Side placement haul handle
  • Hook and loop mast track slot
  • Heavy duty marine grade zipper closure

Materials

  • T-Plus tarpaulin
  • Marine grade zipper
  • Hook and loop mast slot
  • Closed cell foam

Sizes

  • 142cm x 61cm x 8cm 
  • 168cm x 71cm x 10cm
  • 198cm x 81cm x 10cm

title: Solar Shield Downwind SUP Foilboard Bag
body_html:
Downwind foil boards are meticulously crafted, high-performance pieces of equipment where even the slightest imperfections can affect their overall advantages. The Solar Shield Downwind SUP Board Bag is engineered to provide peace of mind when transporting your board to and from the drop location. With 10mm of closed-cell foam enveloping the entire board, it offers protection from inevitable bumps and drops. The T-Plus material shields the board from the sun’s rays when secured on the roof or in a truck bed. Additionally, a full hook and loop mast slot provide ample space for all mast placements on all boards, ensuring versatility and convenience. Trust the Solar Shield Downwind SUP Board Bag to safeguard your precious equipment and maintain its peak performance.

Features

  • T-Plus material providing UV protection
  • 10mm closed cell foam top, bottom and sidewall protection • Side placement haul handle
  • Hook and loop mast track slot
  • External small item pocket
  • Heavy duty marine grade zipper closure
    Materials
  • T-Plus tarpaulin
  • Marine grade zipper
  • Hook and loop mast slot
  • Closed cell foam

Sizes

  • 203cm x 49cm x 20cm (6’6” x 19 1⁄4” x 7 3⁄4”)
  • 228cm x 50cm x 20cm (7’6” x 19 1⁄2” x 7 3⁄4”)
  • 251cm x 55cm x 20cm (8’2” x 21 1⁄2” x 7 3⁄4”)

title: Point Seat Harness
body_html:
The Point seat harness stands out with a unique freedom not commonly found in other models. Crafted with a focus on flexibility and maneuverability, its design draws inspiration from climbing harnesses, featuring a compact geometry. Leveraging Ride Engine’s hard-shell technology, it incorporates Curv® composite material in the lower back, ensuring enduring comfort throughout extended sessions. Adjustable neoprene leg loops enhance comfort, while the fully supported seat guarantees you’ll hardly notice you’re wearing a harness at all. The Point harness includes the TRAD spreader bar, providing a comprehensive setup for your needs.


Features

Curv® Composite Support: Lower back Curv® hard-shell support for fatigue free riding.

Compact Geometry: Climbing harness inspired shaping and fit enhancing flexibility and mobility.

Adjustable Padded Leg Loops: Neoprene adjustable padded leg loops optimizing fit and creating balanced support.

Multiple Leash Attachment Options: Removable handle pass leash attachment and ambidextrous front leash mounting options. • Internal Elastic Waist Belt: Single closure waist belt provides a secure fit and easy adjustment.

Hook Knife Pocket: Convenient, easy access hook knife storage pocket.

Trad Spreader Bar Equipped: Robust confidence inspiring construction boasting an industry leading 8mm stainless steel hook, pre-curved stabilization wings, and Mega Spreader Bar pad comfort.

body_html:
The women’s version of the Point Seat harness mirrors the performance and design excellence of its male counterpart. From the Curv® hard-shell support to the compact geometry enhancing flexibility, all features are retained. However, it’s tailored specifically for the female form, with patterns and fittings optimized for a better fit around the hips and leg loops.

title: Bati Wing Foil Harness
body_html:
Elevate your next wing foiling session with the innovative Bati Wing foil harness. At the heart of the Bati lies the scientifically proven Ride Engine Curv® composite hard shell, designed to evenly distribute harness line tension. Additionally, the Cell-Lock thermoformed padded waist interface delivers optimal support and comfort, maintaining its lightweight composition without water absorption during use. The double closure system ensures a secure fit while allowing ample movement for The Nug harness line hook, promoting a hassle-free and comfortable paddle out - ideal for shallow waters or chasing the wind line. Dual back- mounted D-rings offer versatility in leash attachment options.

Features

  • Curv® Hard Shell: Molded composite material with Ride Engine hard shell technology that gives superior support and comfort.
  • Thermoformed Molded Design: Provides a rash-free, non-water-absorbing interface
  • Hook and Loop Closure: Keeps the harness snug, safe, and secure with no ride up
  • The Nug Sliding Hook: Full side-to-side sliding hook with easy-in and easy-out geometry. Quickly move it out of the way when
    paddling or getting on your board.
  • Dual D-ring attachment points: Two stainless D-rings for multiple leash attachment options.

Elevate your next wing foiling session with the innovative Bati Wing foil harness. At the heart of the Bati lies the scientifically proven Ride Engine Curv® composite hard shell, designed to evenly distribute harness line tension. Additionally, the Cell-Lock thermoformed padded waist interface delivers optimal support and comfort, maintaining its lightweight composition without water absorption during use. The double closure system ensures a secure fit while allowing ample movement for The Nug harness line hook, promoting a hassle-free and comfortable paddle out - ideal for shallow waters or chasing the wind line. Dual back- mounted D-rings offer versatility in leash attachment options.

Features

  • Curv® Hard Shell: Molded composite material with Ride Engine hard shell technology that gives superior support and comfort.
  • Thermoformed Molded Design: Provides a rash-free, non-water-absorbing interface
  • Hook and Loop Closure: Keeps the harness snug, safe, and secure with no ride up
  • The Nug Sliding Hook: Full side-to-side sliding hook with easy-in and easy-out geometry. Quickly move it out of the way when
    paddling or getting on your board.
  • Dual D-ring attachment points: Two stainless D-rings for multiple leash attachment options.

title: Free Float Wing Foil Chest Harness
body_html:
Crafted for ultimate freedom and minimal obstruction, the Free Float Wing Foil chest Harness features a 4-point suspension chest cradle design that distributes harness line pressure while enabling unrestricted movement. Elevating the hook reduces the need for excessive harness line length, minimizing bothersome harness line slap and accidental hooking. Moreover, positioning the chest harness frees up essential waist space, allowing for unhindered use of a waist leash for the wing or board. This harness also comes equipped with a hydration bladder and a detachable harness line hook, perfect for downwind SUP runs.


Features

  • 4 Point Chest Cradle: Fully adjustable with 4 hook and loop, perforated EVA back and chest closures for ultimate stabilization and a shadow like fit.
  • Hydration Bladder: 2-liter hydration bladder.
  • Removable Harness Line Hook: Complete with The Nug, an easily removable harness line hook converting and making the pack
    ideal for downwind SUP runs.
  • EVA Padded Back: Perforated EVA padded back panel for comfort without added weight.

title: Roots Tee
body_html:
The tri-blend fabric creates a vintage, fitted look. And extreme durability makes this t-shirt withstand repeated washings and still remain super comfortable.

• Performance (Slim) fit
• 50% polyester, 25% combed ring-spun cotton, 25% rayon
• Fabric weight: 3.4 oz/yd² (115.3 g/m²)
• Pre-shrunk for extra durability
• 40 singles
• Side-seamed construction
• Blank product sourced from Guatemala, Nicaragua, Honduras, or the US

• Ribbed neck

title: Champion Warm Tech Hoodie
body_html:
If you're looking for a trendy, one-of-a-kind clothing item, this Champion tie-dye hoodie is the one! It's almost impossible to create two similar items during the garment-dyeing process, so every piece has a unique touch to it.


• 82% cotton, 18% poly fleece
• Fabric weight: 12 oz/yd² (406.9 g/m²)
• Unique scrunch-dye, tie-dye pattern
• Reverse Weave® cross-grain cut resists shrinkage
• Two-ply hood with matching drawcords
• 1×1 rib knit side panels, sleeve cuffs, and bottom hem
• Front pouch pocket
• Woven label at the back of the neck
• Embroidered "C" logo on left sleeve
• Blank product sourced from El Salvador

title: Haze Quick Dry Sun Hoodie
body_html:
Crafted from a moisture-wicking, quick-drying semi-perforated fabric, the Haze boasts an impressive UPF rating of 50+. Its standout feature is the innovative 4-way stretch material, designed for optimal elasticity while maintaining a performance fit, perfect for on water activities. Equipped with a built-in gaiter, it ensures ample coverage from the sun without compromising breathability. For unmatched protection during extended hours under the scorching sun, look no further than the Haze.

Features:

  • UPF 50+ protection from the sun’s rays.
  • 4-way stretch quick dry material.
  • Fitted performance hood with integrated gaiter.
  • Thumb hole sleeve providing stay in place performance.
  • Performance comfort fit.

title: Universe Helmet V2
body_html:
Keep your head in the game (and out of the ER) with our lightweight, low-profile Universe Hard-Shell Helmet that's designed specifically for performance watersports. The Universe offers CE-approved safety and rider-approved comfort, and the Perfect Fit dial-adjustment system ensures the helmet stays firmly put. The quick-draining ABS shell and waterproof thermoformed EVA liner provides quick visibility after below-water crashes.

Features

  • CE-approved to EN 1385 standards
  • ABS impact-resistant shell
  • Perfect Fit dial-adjustment system
  • Waterproof thermoformed EVA liner
  • Removable EVA earpads
  • Removable anti-glare brim
  • Low-profile fit

Colors & Sizes

BLACK: Small, Medium, Large
GREEN: Small, Medium, Large
GREY: Small, Medium, Large

Included

High visibility sticker kit

The quick-draining ABS shell and waterproof thermoformed EVA liner provides quick visibility after below-water crashes.

Features

  • CE-approved to EN 1385 standards
  • ABS impact-resistant shell
  • Perfect Fit dial-adjustment system
  • Waterproof thermoformed EVA liner
  • Removable EVA earpads
  • Removable anti-glare brim
  • Low-profile fit

Colors & Sizes

BLACK: Small, Medium, Large
GREEN: Small, Medium, Large
GREY: Small, Medium, Large

Included

High visibility sticker kit

title: Ride Engine Custom Pro PWC Collar
body_html:
Why do you need an Inflatable Collar

• Stability
• Flotation
• Impact Protection
• Improved Handling
• Reduced bow spray
• Ability to carry more equipment

PRO MODEL COLLAR ADVANTAGES

For the Pro model, the main difference lies in its enhanced construction. We have introduced a Traction Top layer, which provides excellent grip when stepping onto the collar. This layer not only ensures good traction but also offers superior UV protection and helps prevent accidental punctures. Additionally, the Pro model features our new TPU molded handles, which are our proprietary design. These handles are tall and easy to grab, with just the right amount of flex, providing an exceptional level of functionality and comfort.

The Ride Engine PWC Inflatable Collar stands out as a custom-designed solution, meticulously crafted to match the specific dimensions of your PWC. Constructed using durable and UV-resistant PVC, this inflatable collar serves the dual purpose of enhancing watercraft stability while preserving agility and maneuverability. Moreover, it offers an additional layer of protection and safety for riders who may come into contact with the PWC during rider acquisition along with providing crucial impact protection for the watercraft itself.

IMPORTANT DELIVERY NOTE:  It's essential to note that the Ride Engine PWC Collars are made to order, precisely tailored to your PWC hull specifications. Upon placing your order, a representative from our dedicated Ride Engine service team will promptly contact you to gather details about your PWC's model and year for programming. Production and delivery can take up to 5-6 weeks from the order date. If you choose one of our common collars in stock, it could take only 2-3 weeks.

Recognizing the growing significance of personal watercraft in the realm of water sports, Ride Engine is dedicated to supporting and crafting products tailored to this need. Witnessing the demand for top-notch accessories to enhance the performance of personal watercraft (PWC), we identified the need to introduce high-quality, high-performance accessories.

title: RE Compression Bag V2
body_html:
Must. Make. All. Gear. Fit. Getting everything to fit into one travel bag ain't easy—sometimes even impossible. The solution? Pack your kites and clothes in the RE Compression Bag. Ultralightweight and with dual-side compression straps, the RE Compression Bag comes in three sizes to accommodate all sizes of kites.

Features

  • Lightweight, compression bag for soft goods
  • Durable, scuff-resistant, tear-resistant 210D nylon material
  • Dual side compression straps for easy packing
  • Name and contents information panel


Sizes

  • SMALL | 50cm x 25cm
  • MEDIUM | 60cm x 30cm
  • LARGE | 70cm x 35cm

Materials

  • PU-coated 210D nylon

title: Origin Windbreaker
body_html:
Chilly morning approach to the beach? Late evening cool down? This is what the
Origin Windbreaker was designed for. A relaxed cut allows for layering under the
windbreaker, and an internal micro-mesh lining allows for internal ventilation
between the outer and inner layer of the jacket. Built from an ever-so-slight reflective material that, when exposed to moisture, creates unique patterns.

Sizes
Small, Medium, Large, X-Large

title: Ride Engine Rescue Sled
body_html:
Meet our new jet ski rescue sled. From ease of use to ensuring efficient jet ski performance, every detail has been meticulously thought out to bring you the best in class. TPU molded semi-rigid handles guarantee a good grip, even in choppy waters. The thin profile allows for rapid mounting and a rockered tail provides better ski handling and acceleration when sled is deployed. Perfect for rescue operations, water sport assistance, transporting people and equipment, or as a nice platform for water lounging après session.

TECHNICAL DETAILS

  • Length 190cm
  • Width 115cm
  • Thickness 8cm
  • Tail Rocker 4cm
  • Inflation High pressure valve
  • # of tow connection points 5
  • # of handles 10

INCLUDED

  • Rescue Sled
  • Connection Hardware
  • Protective Sleeve

title: Air Box Replacement Hose and Nozzle Kit
body_html: Replacement hose and nozzle kit for the Air Box Electric Pump.

title: 2mm Aire Light Neo Glove
body_html:
Keep the chills off your hands with the Aire Light 1.5mm Neo Glove. This thinner version of our harsh conditions Aire gloves offers the same pre-curved design to reduce hand and forearm fatigue. The rubberized texture on the palm gives you a solid grip. Integration with the wetsuit cuffs will keep warmth locked in and the cold out.

Features:

  • Sustainable, durable limestone-based neoprene
  • Pre-curve design eliminates hand pump
  • Tapered wrist entry creates a tight seal, trapping water out
  • Rubberized wetsuit integration
  • Rubberized texture on palm and fingers

title: Odyssey Reef Boot
body_html:
Rocky entries, low tide reef walks, or long parking lots are no match for the Odyssey Reef boot. This mid-cut boot has a stiffer than average sole to ensure nothing will cut your feet. Dual hook and loop straps offer boot stability while the shock cord ankle closure seals out water. Internal split-toe fit keeps the boot in place. The textured sole gives you a superior grip over slippery terrain, along with the ability to grip your board securely. Perfect with or without a wetsuit.

Features:

  • Internal split-toe design
  • Dual hook and loop stabilization
  • Shock cord ankle closure
  • Durable texture grip sole
  • Limestone based neoprene

title: Road Warrior Seat Cover
body_html:
Never worry about jumping in your car wet again with Ride Engine’s Road Warrior seat cover. Made from naturally waterproof neoprene, these seat covers will protect your adventure vehicle’s interior. These quick-drying covers ensure that your seat never stays wet for long and helps to regulate your body temperature for the most comfortable ride. Top and bottom elastane lamination provide superior protection. A simple pull over design means it is easy to install and fits on most car seats.

Features:

  • Waterproof neoprene
  • Elastic pullover design
  • Shock cord securing
  • Dual-side weather proof zip stash pockets
  • Side airbag compatible
  • One size fits most seats

*Sold as a single unit

title: Shelter Light Weight Changing Robe
body_html:
Who said you need sunshine for a perfect session? Ride Engine’s Shelter Light Weight Changing Robe is here to keep you dry, even in the most torrential downpours. With a waterproof micro ripstop material and fitted hood, you’ll stay dry both when changing out of wet water wear and on your way to check the conditions. The full-cut design provides ample space, while the front pouch pocket with a weather-resistant zip keeps all your essentials safe and doubles as a storage pouch.

Features:

  • Micro ripstop weatherproof material
  • Front pouch pocket that doubles as self-storage compartment
  • Shock Cord adjustable hood
  • Full oversized fit
  • One size fits most

title: Bonfire Insulated Changing Robe
body_html:
Make cold-water adventures toasty ones with the Bonfire Insulated Changing Robe. This 100 percent down-filled oversized full-cut poncho provides plenty of space to change out of even the thickest wetsuit. The dual zip kangaroo pocket acts as self-storage, so it’s easy to stash away in your gear bag or vehicle. Plus, the fully insulated hood seals in the heat, keeping you warm for the post-session parking lot social hour or the drive home.

Features:

  • Full 100% down insulation
  • Wind-resistant nylon shell
  • Front kangaroo stash pocket
  • Shock cord adjustable hood
  • Full oversized fit
  • One size fits most

title: Air Box Electric Pump
body_html:
The technology evolution for kites, wings, and boards has rapidly improved to enhance your experience on the water. However, perhaps the most critical component required to get on the water -the pump- has remained unchanged since the days of flip phones. Not anymore. Gone are the times of struggling with manual pumping, thanks to the Air Box: Ride Engine's rechargeable electric pump. Engineered alongside a top electric pump manufacturer, the Air Box has a powerful two-stage system that automatically switches from low-pressure, high-volume pumping to high-pressure, low-volume delivering the fastest inflation possible.

Eliminate the worry of over or under inflating your gear when you set your desired air pressure on the Air Box. The smart inflation technology has real-time pressure monitoring, ensuring an automatic shut-off once the pump reaches the selected pressure. Powered by a lithium-ion battery cell, it can inflate four to six kites or wings, and three SUPs on a single charge.


SIZE: 162mm x 162mm x 85mm

11.1V.    4000mAh.    44.4Wh.


INCLUDES: Air Box, Hose (3'), 4 Nozzles, USB-C Charging Cable, 12V Car Charger

title: Roam V1 Harness
body_html:
Core minimalist or the world travels looking to save space, Ride Engine now brings you the Roam harness.

Traveling with gear these days can be hard between the puzzle to fit boards, kites, sails, foils, etc., and the nightmare that is an overweight bag. Thoughtfully designed to be pliable to fit in the smallest available space, the Roam is extremely lightweight without sacrificing support or performance. We've kept the DNA of the Lumbar Lock technology via the Cradle Support System. Using this unique webbing tension system we increased rigidity across the entire back of the harness to create uniform support that is free of pressure points or hot spots. Made with non-water-absorbent Cell Lock foam, it not only keeps the harness light in use but also dries fast for immediate packing. Equipped with the Unity Webbing Connection system that allows for a one-time set it and forget it adjustment.

*Spreader bar sold separately.

title: Brisa Women's V1 Harness
body_html:
The science and testing that brought the world's first and best fitting unisex hard-shell harness now brings you the best harness for women.

Meet the Brisa- Ride Engine's first ever women's specific fit harness for kiteboarding and windsurfing. Through rigorous testing, we uncovered the optimal wrap profile and height to fit the unique qualities of the female physique. The locked-in fit around the hip allows for complete mobility, all while keeping the same scientifically, data backed Lumbar Lock shape. The Brisa is built using Curv composite material that retains a hard-shell harness feel. With the mid-flex rating acting like suspension, it smooths out the ride from choppy water to hard landings. Equipped with the innovative Unity Direct Connection system that has become the benchmark for eliminating harness spreader bar rise and twist.

*Spreader bar sold separately

The Brisa is built using Curv composite material that retains a hard-shell harness feel. With the mid-flex rating acting like suspension, it smooths out the ride from choppy water to hard landings. Equipped with the innovative Unity Direct Connection system that has become the benchmark for eliminating harness spreader bar rise and twist.

*Spreader bar sold separately

title: Lyte Webbing Connection V2 Harness
body_html:
A Ride Engine harness can't just be lightweight—it also has to excel in terms of comfort and no-compromise performance. We accomplished this by utilizing the same data-driven design of our Elite Carbon and combing that with the latest in material technology. The ingenious Curv® composite material we use is not merely lightweight—its high tensile strength allows the shell to retain Ride Engine's scientifically designed Lumbar Lock shape, which has become renowned for eliminating harness rise and twisting on the body. Equipped with Direct Connection or Webbing Connection, the Lyte V2 integrates directly with our Unity Spreader Bar, which completely eliminates spreader bar slip and twist. Additionally making the Lyte the ultimate lightweight travel harness is our Cell-Lock Foam: thermoformed closed-cell foam that's Lycra laminated to virtually eliminate all water absorption and keep the harness light no matter how long your session.

*Spreader bar sold separately.

Equipped with Direct Connection or Webbing Connection, the Lyte V2 integrates directly with our Unity Spreader Bar, which completely eliminates spreader bar slip and twist. Additionally making the Lyte the ultimate lightweight travel harness is our Cell-Lock Foam: thermoformed closed-cell foam that's Lycra laminated to virtually eliminate all water absorption and keep the harness light no matter how long your session.

*Spreader bar sold separately.

title: Vinaka V2 Wing Harness
body_html: The world's first purpose-built harness for wing foiling, the Vinaka will have you riding longer and pinching upwind more efficiently by taking the wing's weight off your arms whenever you want. The Vinaka's ultra-minimal, no-BS design of ripstop nylon and thin closed-cell foam weighs in at a mere 450 grams, so you can still fully enjoy the free feeling of wing foiling. With a shadow-like fit and sliding hook, the Vinaka virtually disappears when swimming, paddling, or riding toeside (situations where a traditional kite or windsurf harness can be a massive hassle/pain/annoyance). If you want to extend your wing foiling sessions, the Vinaka will help you stay out on the water when everyone else that's winging must head in because their arms are smoked.

title: Vinaka Pro Wing Harness
body_html: A next-level wing foiling harness for next-level wing foiling, the Vinaka Pro has a unique thermo-molded design that delivers superior support and a clean, shadow-like fit for fatigue-free, maximum-efficiency riding. The Vinaka Pro's inset support band doesn't absorb water, which keeps everything ultralight and dry, no matter how long your session. A sliding harness hook completely moves to either side for ease of padding and keeping your board ding-free.

title: Slash Seat V1 Harness
body_html:
Style and function—why can't you both? Now you can thanks to our Slash seat harness that blends the comfort and support of a seat harness with the look of a pair of boardshorts. And like everything we make at Ride Engine, the Slash was intelligently designed—the short's length and width was heavily field tested to ensure an optimum fit with full range of motion and no binding. And just like the Contour, the Slash is ultra-compact, fits low on the hips for added freedom, and has adjustable, padded leg loops.

*Spreader bar sold separately.

title: Contour Seat Harness V2
body_html:
The Contour is our first-ever seat harness and great attention was placed in its design in order to address all the shortcomings of traditional seat harnesses (think: more like a climbing harness and less like a diaper). The key design element in the Contour is the sacrum adjustment plate, which utilizes Curv® material to bring our hard-shell harness DNA into a seat harness. The sacrum adjustment plate creates a tighter, more supportive fit along the sacrum by removing the gap that is present in most seat harnesses. Additionally, the Contour is far more compact than other seat harnesses, fitting lower on the hips for added freedom, and has a secure, easy-to-adjust belt entry and adjustable padded leg loops.

*Spreader bar sold separately.

title: Momentum V3 Harness
body_html:
The Momentum V3 is our best-in-class soft-shell harness, built for those riders who desire the locked-in fit of a Ride Engine hard shell but also want maximum freedom and flex. The Momentum offers the same scientifically shaped Lumbar Lock back support and fit via a molded internal support plate. The Momentum harness connects directly with our Unity Spreader Bar with webbing for state-of-the-art connectivity.

*Spreader bar sold separately.

title: Saber V3 Harness
body_html:
From the outside, the Saber looks the same as our other Ride Engine harness—but look closer. Using the same proprietary data that created our Elite Carbon hard-shell shape, the frame of the Saber is actually a Structurally Engineered Shell of slightly softer composite material for the kitesurfer or windsurfer that wants a bit more freedom in their ride. The injected-molded shell has purpose-driven contours that deliver more torsional flex than the Elite Carbon and Lyte harnesses while still providing the full benefits of Lumbar Lock fit and that coveted Ride Engine locked-in feel. The Saber comes equipped with Unity Ladder-Lock Straps so it's ready to plug into our Unity Spreader Bar for maximum connectivity and zero slippage.

*Spreader bar sold separately.

Using the same proprietary data that created our Elite Carbon hard-shell shape, the frame of the Saber is actually a Structurally Engineered Shell of slightly softer composite material for the kitesurfer or windsurfer that wants a bit more freedom in their ride. The injected-molded shell has purpose-driven contours that deliver more torsional flex than the Elite Carbon and Lyte harnesses while still providing the full benefits of Lumbar Lock fit and that coveted Ride Engine locked-in feel. The Saber comes equipped with Unity Ladder-Lock Straps so it's ready to plug into our Unity Spreader Bar for maximum connectivity and zero slippage.

*Spreader bar sold separately.

title: Carbon Elite V8 Harness
body_html:
The unrivaled benchmark in carbon-fiber hard-shell harnesses, the Elite Carbon V8 continues to lead the way thanks to its data-based design and ergonomic shape for superior support and comfort. Built with the latest in material technology, including 12K molded carbon fiber, limestone-based neoprene, and Fusion closed-cell memory foam for maximum durability and performance. Equipped with Unity Ladder-Lock Straps so it's ready to integrate with our Unity Spreader Bar (goodbye sloppy webbing!), the Elite Carbon is constructed using top-shelf 12K carbon fiber, which ensures a durable, strong Armor Shell frame in a lightweight, high-performance package. When combined with our Fusion Memory Foam and proprietary Shell Skin technology with Lumbar Lock shaping, the Elite Carbon provides the ultimate in connection, feel and support.

*Spreader bar sold separately.

title: Day Strike Progressive Board Bag V3
body_html:
Board shapes are getting funky nowadays, and our Day Strike Progressive Board Bag is designed to keep that interesting blunt nose, wide midpoint, or alternative surf craft safe and sound, no matter what the day's travel schedule. Our Day Strike Progressive Board Bag is loaded with features and is designed to optimally fit all the funkier shapes from retro fish to finless soul gliders.

Features

  • Progressive bag design for blunt- and round-shaped boards
  • Durable, lightweight, padded construction
  • Padded haul handle and removable shoulder strap
  • Reflective foil material for temperature regulation
  • TPU ventilation port
  • Internal hook-and-loop stash pocket
  • Quick-access external zip pocket
  • Webbing loop for hanging storage


Sizes

  • 4"8" x 23"
  • 5"0" x 24.5"
  • 5'4" x 24.5" | 3.55 lb (minimal weight variance between sizes)
  • 5'8" x 25"
  • 6'0" x 25.5"
  • 6'4" x 25"
  • 6'8" x 25.5"


Materials

  • TPU-coated ripstop for durability
  • 600D nylon ripstop shell offers abrasion and tear resistance
  • 5mm foam top and bottom padding
  • Silver reflective foil for heat dispersion
  • Heavy-duty YKK zippers

Our Day Strike Progressive Board Bag is loaded with features and is designed to optimally fit all the funkier shapes from retro fish to finless soul gliders.

title: Adapt Wing Board Sock V1 6'0"
body_html:
Keep your precious winged wave craft protected with the lightweight, stretchable Adapt Wing Board Sock. The oversized opening will stretch around the mast, so you can keep everything rigged up and ready, while still keeping it safe from the little dings.

Features

  • Heavy-duty drawstring closure
  • Adaptable design for all nose shapes - Fits around most mast placements.


Color & Size
GREEN | 6'0" x 25"

Materials

  • Elastic woven nylon
  • Woven drawstring cord

title: Adapt Board Sock V2
body_html:
Ideal for a quick run to the beach, the lightweight, stretchable Adapt Board Sock will keep the scratches away and wax off the seats of your vehicle. Its unique adaptable-nose design accommodates classic surfboards as well as blunt-nose board designs.

Features

  • Heavy-duty drawstring closure
  • Convertible to accommodate classic and blunt-nose board shapes


Sizes

  • 6'4" x 18"
  • 6'8" x 19"

  • Elastic woven nylon
  • Woven drawstring cord

title: Thermal Block Classic Board Bag
body_html:
You protect your body from the sun, right? Then you should also protect your board from the same harmful UV rays with our Thermal Block Classic Board Bag that's constructed with solar reflective material to keep the rays off and temp down. Designed to handle classic surfboard shapes from your groveler to your step-up. And forget about stressing that your friend put your board in the back of the truck at the bottom of the stack—the Thermal Block Classic Board Bag protects from bumps and bruises in transport in a lightweight construction that doesn't skimp on protection (thank you, 5mm foam padding!).

Features

  • Lightweight solar-resistant tarpaulin material with 600D nylon panel
  • Heavy-duty, corrosion-resistant zip entry
  • Internal stash pocket for wax, keys, and other small items


Sizes

  • 5'4" x 21.5"
  • 5'8" x 22"
  • 6'0" x 22.5" | 2.2 lb (minimal weight variance between sizes)
  • 6'4" x 23"
  • 6'8" x 23.5"
  • 7'0" x 24.5"


Materials

  • Tarpaulin polyester skin
  • 600D nylon reinforcement
  • Corrosion-resistant YKK zipper

title: Day Strike Twin Tip V3
body_html:
Designed to fit multiple kiteboards or wakeboards up to 148cm long, our Day Strike Twin Tip Board Bag features a full-length zipper, burly haul handle, and a padded shoulder sling for easy transport. The interior has the same padded lining as our surfboard bags for added protection and helps to keep wet gear contained. The bag dimensions are ample enough to fit two or three twin tips stacked without bindings or straps or a single twin with straps and includes an integrated compartment to keep small items organized.

Features

  • Simple, lightweight protective design
  • Spacious enough to include wetsuit, towel, dry clothing and other essentials
  • Padded, removable shoulder strap
  • Single reinforced haul handle
  • Quick-access exterior stash pocket
  • Reflective foil for temperature regulation
  • TPU ventilation port
  • Full-length zipper access
  • Transparent inner hardware pocket
  • Webbing loop for hanging storage


Sizes
148CM X 43CM


Materials

  • 5mm PE foam padding
  • TPU-coated ripstop for durability
  • 600D nylon ripstop shell offering abrasion and tear resistance
  • Silver reflective foil heat dispersion
  • Heavy-duty YKK zippers

title: Wing Board Travel Coffin
body_html:
Designed for modern wing boards, this coffin travel bag will get your prized deck to the destination in one piece and ding free. The Wing Board Travel Coffin's wide-body wheeled chassis cruises through airports, dirt roads, and stairs with the toughness of a semi-truck. A robust 360-degree padding keeps all the goods protected, a full-length, heavy-duty zipper opens wide for easy packing/stuffing, and a large internal pocket fits your wings for extra TLC. The Wing Board Travel Coffin's dual mesh pockets in the nose and tail are ideal for stashing wetsuits, sun protection and other soft articles and stay in place during those pesky TSA luggage inspections keeping extra protection in the intended place.

Features

  • Wide-body wheeled chassis
  • Padded, removable shoulder strap
  • Full-length, heavy-duty zipper access
  • Quick-access exterior stash pocket
  • TPU ventilation port
  • Transparent interior pockets for hardware and essentials
  • Internal gear stabilization tie downs
  • External ID pocket
  • Internal pockets for added packing protection and article organization
  • Heavy-duty YKK zippers
  • Burly haul handles


Sizes

  • 4.8' x 28" x 10" | 13.8 lb
  • 5.6' x 30" x 10" | 14.75 lb
  • 6.6' x 32" x 10" | 15.6 lb

Materials

  • 10mm PE foam bottom and sidewalls
  • 5mm PE foam top
  • TPU-coated ripstop for durability
  • 600D nylon ripstop shell offering abrasion and tear resistance
  • Heavy-duty YKK zippers

title: Navigator Trolley V3
body_html:
Destination: selected. Tickets: bought. Now you just gotta get your gear there—in one piece. Enter the Navigator Trolley V3, designed to effortlessly carry all your gear with superior padding and dependability. The top lid has a full-length heavy-duty zipper that opens up wide, and an external storage pocket is designed for all the wet gear on the return trip. Available in three sizes, the Navigator Trolley V3 accommodates everything from large twin tips to small foil boards.

Features

  • Durable, padded, tough-as-it-comes construction
  • Heavy-duty XL wheels
  • Large top opening for easy packing and organization
  • External wet/dry storage compartment
  • Quick-access exterior stash pocket
  • Dual drag handles for bump-free walking
  • Multiple reinforced haul handles
  • Burly skid-rail protection
  • Exterior compression straps
  • Interior mesh stash pocket
  • Padded board divider
  • Dual internal cargo hold-down straps
  • External ID pocket


Sizes

  • SMALL | 146CM x 46CM x 24CM | 11.4 lb
  • MEDIUM | 162CM x 46CM x 24CM | 11.55 lb
  • LARGE | 172CM x 46CM x 24CM | 11.75 lb


Materials

  • 10mm PE foam bottom and sidewalls
  • 5mm PE foam top
  • TPU-coated ripstop for durability
  • 600D nylon ripstop shell offering abrasion and tear resistance
  • Heavy-duty YKK zippers
  • 1600D ballistic PVC

title: RE Ultra-Lite Foot Strap
body_html:
Coming in at under six ounces per pair, the Ultra-Lite Foot Strap's minimalist design offers a secure, no-frills connection for your kite surfboards, foil boards and tow boards.

Features

  • Soft, Lycra-lined neoprene
  • Sonic-reinforced mounting holes
  • Ergonomic shape
  • Lightweight: less than six ounces
  • Complete with hardware


Colors & Size
BLACK | One-size adjustable
GREEN | One-size adjustable

title: RE Ultra-Lite Foot Strap
body_html:
Coming in at under six ounces per pair, the Ultra-Lite Foot Strap's minimalist design offers a secure, no-frills connection for your kite surfboards, foil boards and tow boards.

Features

  • Soft, Lycra-lined neoprene
  • Sonic-reinforced mounting holes
  • Ergonomic shape
  • Lightweight: less than six ounces
  • Complete with hardware


Colors & Size
BLACK | One-size adjustable
GREEN | One-size adjustable

title: RE Dyno Foot Strap V2
body_html:
Surf, foil, or tow, it's all the same: connection to your board for dynamic moves is critical. The RE Dyno Foot Strap is a fully adjustable and adaptable to tune/lock/- dial in your connection demands.

Features

  • Sleek, hidden adjustment
  • Plush neoprene full wrap
  • Adaptable for single- or double-insert configurations
  • Hardware included
  • Strap sold as a single unit


Colors & Size
BLACK | One-size adjustable
GREEN | One-size adjustable

title: Ankle Gaskets
body_html:
Balloon leg, elephant leg, water baby… whatever you call it, it's annoying. Even if your wetsuit has an ankle drain hole this nuisance can't be 100% avoided. We decided enough was enough and designed our Ankle Gaskets: a simple yet highly effective hook-and-loop strap that keep water from entering through your ankle openings of your wetsuit. Bye-bye, balloon leg.

Features

  • Thin, waterproof Hypalon hook-and-loop design
  • Alignment loop
  • Tapered shape

title: Jedi Robe V3
body_html:
Updated with plush, water-absorbent microfiber fleece, our Jedi Robe has been leveled to be an even more comfortable cocoon against the elements. We designed the cut of the Jedi Robe with ample space to make wiggling out of your 5/4 wetsuit or dropping your trunks/bikini a breeze. A large, oversized hood cuts the chill and blocks the sun's harsh rays. It's highly absorbent for a fast dry off and machine washable for everlasting fresh changes.

Features

  • Premium plush, water-absorbing microfiber material
  • Ample cut for a quick change out of boardshorts, bikinis and wetsuits
  • Oversized hood
  • Extra-large front pocket for essentials and hand warming
  • One size

title: Flip Cam Adjustable Foot Strap
body_html:
Infinite adjustment for the perfect fit with multiple mounting locations and easy to adjust with a push-button cam, the Cam Adjustment Strap will have your fit fully dialed. Durable and supported with TPU-reinforced construction, the Cam Adjustment Strap is also fully wrapped in Lycra-lined neoprene making this strap the most luxurious you can find.

Features

  • Soft, Lycra-lined neoprene
  • Ergonomic shape
  • TPU-reinforced support
  • Easy-to-adjust, push-button cam
  • Complete with 25mm self-tapping screws w/nylon washer
  • Strap sold as a single unit


Color & Size
BLACK | One-size adjustable

title: Link Adjustable Foot Strap
body_html:
When function dictates form. The Link Foot Strap is easy to operate in on-the-fly situations where a loose fit for comfort and convenience needs to be quickly changed to a tighter, more-connected fit.

Features

  • Comfortable neoprene and Lycra-lined wrap
  • Hook-and-loop D-ring for easy adjustment
  • Multiple spread options
  • Hardware included
  • Strap sold as a single unit


Color & Size
BLACK | One-size adjustable

title: Minimalist EVA Foot Strap
body_html:
Less can be more. Don't believe us? Then check out our Minimalist Foot Strap, built with thermoformed EVA, it's the perfect strap if you want to stay connected but also want to get free quickly. The Minimalist Foot Strap's webbing reinforcement lays virtually flat when paddling and pops up when not under pressure, making it a primo choice for sinker wing boards, tow boards, and freeride kite-foil boards.

Features

  • Thermoformed non-water-absorbing EVA
  • Webbing reinforcement
  • Internal screw support for a near-flush mount
  • Hardware included
  • Strap sold as a single unit


Color & Size
BLACK | One-size adjustable

title: Venture Round Rack Pad 20"
body_html:
Creases and pressure dents in your board ain't sweet. The Venture Round Roof Rack Pad provides ample protection for any watercraft you feel fit to lift onto your vehicle rack. The 360-degree, closed-cell foam pad rolls nicely when you slide boards on the roof, leaving no exposed rack. Long-term durability is locked in with UV-resistant, 600D-coated ripstop nylon.

Features

  • 360-degree foam insert
  • UV-resistant, 600D-coated nylon ripstop
  • Hook-and-loop closure for easy installation and removal
  • Fits round and square rack bars
  • Covers the entire length of the rack
  • 600D-coated nylon
  • Close-cell foam
  • Sold as a package of two


Size
20" (50CM)

title: Peak AERO Rack Pad
body_html:
From the Autobahn to the PCH, the Peak Aero Roof Rack Pad is designed to fit on your car's aerodynamic rack crossbars. The pad features PCV-coated, UV-resistant 600D nylon, a closed-cell, firm-density foam to protect your boards. The Peak Aero Roof Rack Pad is available in two sizes to accommodate any rack span.

Features

  • Designed for aerodynamic rack crossbars
  • Durable foam insert
  • Hook-and-loop closure
  • Suitable for surfboards, SUPs, windsurf boards and wingsurf boards
  • 600D-coated nylon
  • Close-cell foam
  • Sold as a package of two


Sizes

  • 28" (71CM)
  • 34" (86CM)

title: Trip Tie Down Green - Narrow
body_html:
Do your travel plans include planes, vans, trucks, cars, boats to outer reefs, etc? Then you need the Trip Tie Down Straps.

Lightweight for travel, but bombproof for the securing of the load, the Trip Tie Down Straps will keep everything secure and dialed.

Features

  • Heavy-duty nylon webbing
  • Corrosion-resistant cam lock
  • Hypalon buckle cover
  • Padded cargo protector
  • Easy-feed webbing tab
  • 100% nylon webbing
  • Comes in pair of 2 Tie Downs


Size
15' x 25MM x 4.5M

title: Expedition Tie Down Green - Wide
body_html:
Whether you are road-tripping your way to San Carlos, Mexico, or Klitmøller, Denmark, the Expedition Tie Down Straps are ready for the long haul with 15 feet of ultra-strong webbing.

These durable tie-downs feature a push-button cam lock, Hypalon cam cover, and soft cargo protector that will not only secure your surfboards, wing boards and windsurf boards, but also any other cargo that will not fit inside your vehicle.

Features

  • Heavy-duty nylon webbing
  • Corrosion-resistant cam-lock buckle
  • Hypalon buckle cover
  • Padded cargo protector
  • Easy-feed webbing tab
  • 100% nylon webbing
  • Comes in pair of 2 Tie Downs


Size
15' x 35MM x 4.5M

title: Flight Half Finger Glove
body_html:
Looking for more connection to your power source without losing the tactile feel and dexterity in your fingers? The Flight glove features a full synthetic material construction that increases grip on wing handles, booms, and kite bars while decreasing fatigue and protecting you from the elements. The half finger design retains dexterity and allows for easy rigging, gear setup and on water adjustments, all with the gloves on.

Features

  • Half-finger glove retaining tactile feel and dexterity
  • Hook and loop wrist closure
  • Dual-layer, grip-enhanced, palm and finger material for durability
  • Synthetic quick-dry material with elastane stretch panels for a comfortable fit

Sizes
X-Small, Small, Medium, Large, X-Large

body_html:

The full finger design offers the ultimate full hand coverage from the harsh elements.

title: Taxi Kneepad
body_html:
Kneeling while wing foiling is a necessity, even if the grippy EVA deck pad tends to rip holes in your knees.

Spend more time on the water with less pain by adding one small accessory to your session. The Taxi Knee Pad is designed to be an extra layer between you and the deck pad. Wear it on your bare skin or under your wetsuit for added padding.

Features

  • Engineered weaved elastic pattern for comfort and protection
  • Elastane piped top and bottom edges for secure, comfortable, in-place hold

title: Taxi Kneepad
body_html:
Kneeling while wing foiling is a necessity, even if the grippy EVA deck pad tends to rip holes in your knees.

Spend more time on the water with less pain by adding one small accessory to your session. The Taxi Knee Pad is designed to be an extra layer between you and the deck pad. Wear it on your bare skin or under your wetsuit for added padding.

  • Elastane piped top and bottom edges for secure, comfortable, in-place hold

title: Day Strike Foil Bag V3
body_html:
Carrying a hydrofoil board can be awkward—with or without the foil mounted. The Day Strike Foil Bag is designed to reduce the cumbersome nature of transporting hydrofoil boards by providing ample padding and carrying options. We built several sizes to accommodate and protect any and all foil boards—from the largest SUP and wingsurf boards to the smallest kite-foil boards.

Features

  • Designed to fit modern hydrofoil board shapes
  • Half-length hook-and-loop mast channel to keep hydrofoil assembled
  • 5mm padding on the top and bottom
  • Reflective material for heat dispersion when exposed to the sun
  • Removable, padded shoulder strap and side-mount handle mesh pocket
  • TPU ventilation port


Sizes

  • 4'2" x 23" x 3"
  • 5'0" x 27" x 3" | 4.3 lb (minimal weight variance between sizes)
  • 6'0" x 30" x 4"
  • 7'6" x 34" x 5"


Materials

  • TPU-coated ripstop for durability
  • 600D nylon ripstop shell for abrasion and tear resistance
  • 5mm foam top and bottom padding provides extra impact protection
  • Silver reflective foil for heat dispersion
  • Heavy-duty YKK zippers

title: 5mm Aire Boots
body_html:
Your feet get cold, you get cold. You get cold, you get out of the water, and end your session early. Solution? Keep your feet warm in our round-toed, internal split, 5mm Aire Boots, and keep that session going!

Built with petrochemical-free limestone neoprene, our Aire Boots are packed with feet-saving features that cut the cold and protect on the rocky walk to the water, including a fast-drying, heat-trapping Thermal Lock fleece liner.

Features

  • Sustainable, durable limestone neoprene
  • Thermal Lock fleece liner that traps heat and dries fast
  • Tapered ankle entry creates a tight seal, trapping water out
  • Rubberized wetsuit integration
  • Rubber-molded outer for grip and durability
  • Hook-and-loop secure closure
  • Ankle pull tab for easy entry
  • Internal split toe

title: 5mm Aire Boots
body_html:
Your feet get cold, you get cold. You get cold, you get out of the water, and end your session early. Solution? Keep your feet warm in our round-toed, internal split, 5mm Aire Boots, and keep that session going!

Built with petrochemical-free limestone neoprene, our Aire Boots are packed with feet-saving features that cut the cold and protect on the rocky walk to the water, including a fast-drying, heat-trapping Thermal Lock fleece liner.

Features

  • Sustainable, durable limestone neoprene
  • Thermal Lock fleece liner that traps heat and dries fast
  • Tapered ankle entry creates a tight seal, trapping water out
  • Rubberized wetsuit integration
  • Rubber-molded outer for grip and durability
  • Hook-and-loop secure closure
  • Ankle pull tab for easy entry
  • Internal split toe

title: 5mm Aire Neo Gloves
body_html:
Like most everyone else, we were tired of wearing clunky gloves in the water. So we did what we always do—went to the design studio and created ones that are far superior. Made with petrochemical-free limestone neoprene, our 5mm Aire Gloves have a pre-curve design that eliminates the hand pump associated with most neoprene gloves. We also added rubberized texture to provide a more tactile feel and a Thermal Lock fleece liner for maximum warmth.

Features

  • Sustainable, durable limestone neoprene
  • Pre-curve design eliminates hand pump
  • Thermal Lock fleece liner that traps heat and dries fast
  • Tapered wrist entry creates a tight seal, trapping water out
  • Rubberized wetsuit integration
  • Rubberized texture on palm and fingers

title: Women's Sensor 2mm Back Zip Long Sleeve Springsuit
body_html:
The perfect warm-weather spring suits for when your home spot finally warms up, or you travel to tropical destinations.

The Sensor suit is the closest you can get to wearing a bikini while still in a wetsuit. The ultra-soft sustainable limestone neoprene keeps the harsh sun off your skin and ensures you are comfortable for even the longest tropical downwinder or surf session. Redesigned fit that's been rigorously tested to meet a high standard of both form and function. We've skipped the in vogue prints for a timeless classic look in the highest performing spring suit we have made yet.

Features

  • Made from sustainable limestone neoprene that is PFC and PTFE free
  • Flat Lock Stitching and smart panel construction provide the ultimate stretch for less fatigue, meaning you get longer sessions
  • Back zip for easy entry and reduced flushing with a seamless front panel
  • Glide skin offers ultimate comfort and reduces chafing
  • Solvent and hydrophobic coating free to keep harsh chemicals out of the water
  • Superior sun protection

Water Temp: 64°F to 72°F | 18°C to 22°C

title: Sensor 2mm Short Sleeve Springsuit
body_html:
The perfect warm-weather spring suits for when your home spot finally warms up, or you travel to tropical destinations.

The Sensor 2mm Short Sleeve Springsuit brings uncompromising durability with top-of-the-line construction for the best in premium warm weather wetsuits. The ultra-comfortable stretchy high memory sustainable limestone neoprene will keep you cozy without overheating all while keeping the harsh sun off your skin. Outstanding rigorously tested fit that meets a high standard for both form and function. Be the envy of your mates at your spot with the highest performing spring suit we have made yet.

Features

  • Made from sustainable limestone neoprene that is PFC and PTFE free
  • Flat Lock Stitching and smart panel construction provide the ultimate stretch for less fatigue, meaning you get longer sessions
  • Asymmetrical front zip means easy entry and reduced flushing
  • Glide skin offers ultimate comfort and reduce chafing

The Sensor 2/1 Front Zip Long Sleeve Springsuit suits bring uncompromising durability with top-of-the-line construction for the best in premium warm weather wetsuits. The ultra-comfortable stretchy high memory sustainable limestone neoprene will keep you cozy without overheating all while keeping the harsh sun off your skin. Outstanding rigorously tested fit that meets a high standard for both form and function. Be the envy of your mates at your spot with the highest performing spring suit we have made yet.

Features

  • Made from sustainable limestone neoprene that is PFC and PTFE free
  • Flat Lock Stitching and smart panel construction provide the ultimate stretch for less fatigue, meaning you get longer sessions
  • Asymmetrical front zip means easy entry and reduced flushing
  • Glide skin offers ultimate comfort and reduce chafing
  • Solvent and hydrophobic coating free to keep harsh chemicals out of the water
  • Superior sun protection

Water Temp: 64°F to 72°F | 18°C to 22°C

title: Women's Onsen 5/4/3 Front Zip Full Wetsuit
body_html:
Whether you are living in a cold climate or looking to extend your season the women's Onsen 5/4/3, built with 100% Yamamoto #40, will deliver warm sessions in frigid conditions. Strategically built for max warmth and max mobility, the Onsen 5/4/3 has 5mm in the torso, 4mm in the legs, and 3mm in the arms.

Onsen wetsuits are constructed with 100% Yamamoto #40 neoprene. Every detail has been tested in the harshest of conditions and designed utilizing comprehensive research and development that implements environmentally sustainable materials.

Water Temp: 50°F and below | 10°C and below

Model Size: Model is 5’5” tall, 125lbs and is wearing a size 6

title: Women's Onsen 4/3/2 Front Zip Full Wetsuit
body_html:
Our Onsen 4/3 women's wetsuit is the one-suit quiver killer. The geometric cell structure of Yamamoto #40 in our Onsen wetsuits is 98% water impermeable and locks in body heat, which allows this 4/3 exceptionally comfort and warmth into water temps that could warrant a 5/4.

Onsen wetsuits are constructed with 100% Yamamoto #40 neoprene. Every detail has been tested in the harshest of conditions and designed utilizing comprehensive research and development that implements environmentally sustainable materials.

Water Temp: 50°F to 57°F | 10°C to 14°C

Model Size: Model is 5’5” tall, 125lbs and is wearing a size 6

Our Onsen 4/3 is the one-suit quiver killer. The geometric cell structure of Yamamoto #40 in our Onsen wetsuits are 98% water impermeable and locks in body heat, which allows this 4/3 exceptionally comfort and warmth into water temps that could warrant a 5/4.

Onsen wetsuits are constructed with 100% Yamamoto #40 neoprene. Every detail has been tested in the harshest of conditions and designed utilizing comprehensive research and development that implements environmentally sustainable materials.

Water Temp: 50°F to 57°F | 10°C to 14°C

Model Size: Model is 6’0” tall, 185lbs and is wearing a size Large

title: Onsen 5/4/3 Front Zip Full Wetsuit
body_html:
Whether you are living in a cold climate or looking to extend your season the Onsen 5/4/3, built with 100% Yamamoto #40, will deliver warm sessions in frigid conditions. Strategically built for max warmth and max mobility, the Onsen 5/4/3 has 5mm in the torso, 4mm in the legs, and 3mm in the arms.

Onsen wetsuits are constructed with 100% Yamamoto #40 neoprene. Every detail has been tested in the harshest of conditions and designed utilizing comprehensive research and development that implements environmentally sustainable materials.

Water Temp: 50°F and below | 10°C and below

Model Size: Model is 6’0” tall, 185lbs and is wearing a size Large

title: Compact Foil Travel Bag
body_html:
Built for the dedicated kite hydrofoil traveler, the Compact Foil Travel Bag is optimized to fit up to a 92cm mast, hydrofoil front wing up to 900mm, stabilizer and fuselage, two lightweight foil kites, and bar. The wheeled chassis and retractable handle make travel transitions a breeze, and the internal storage pockets keep hardware and tools organized.

Features

  • Optimized size for compact, performance hydrofoil gear
  • Wheeled chassis
  • Retractable pull handle
  • Internal storage pockets
  • Streamlined haul handles
  • Quick-view external ID pocket

Size

  • 95CM x 45CM x 18CM

Weight

  • 7.5lbs / 3.5kg

Materials

  • 600D nylon-ripstop shell for abrasion and tear resistance
  • Heavy-duty YKK zippers
  • 1600D ballistic PVC
  • Nylon rolling chassis

title: Globe Trotter Board Bag
body_html:
The Big Momma of our board bags, the Globetrotter is designed for windsurfing, wing foiling, and big-wave guns. Built to travel the world with you and get all your gear there—and we're talking all of it, from boards to masts to wings to wetties—with ease and reliability thanks to its haul handles, shoulder strap, and wheels. The Globetrotter Board Bag fits it all, so you won't miss a session at your final destination.

Features

  • Durable, lightweight padded construction
  • Burly, reinforced haul handles 
  • Stable, solid-wheeled chassis for easy transfers
  • TPU ventilation port
  • Internal organization pockets
  • Quick-access external zip pocket
  • Full-length heavy-duty zipper access
  • Dual transparent inner hardware pockets
  • Internal gear stabilization tie-downs
  • External ID pocket an ingenious design utilizing custom-molded ladder-lock straps, thereby eliminating the use of traditional webbing and providing an unrivaled locked-in fit.


Size

  • 240cm x 70cm x 35cm | 18 lb


Materials

  • 10mm PE foam bottom and sidewalls
  • 5mm PE foam top
  • TPU-coated ripstop for durability
  • 600D nylon ripstop shell offering abrasion and tear resistance
  • Heavy-duty YKK zippers

title: Thermal Block Foil Board Bag
body_html:
Possibly the most expensive item in your garage besides your car, your foil board is your pride and joy, so treat it with the TLC it deserves by transporting it in our Thermal Block Foil Board Bag. Built with solar-reflective material to keep harmful UV rays from cooking your foil board. Sized to cover everything from large wing foil and SUP foil boards to prone surf foil and sinker-wing boards to kite foil boards, the Thermal Block Foil Board Bag also has a hook-and-loop mast slot so you can keep the foil installed worry and hassle-free.

Features

  • Lightweight solar-resistant tarpaulin material with 600D nylon panel
  • Heavy-duty, corrosion-resistant zip entry
  • Hook-and-loop mast slot
  • Internal stash pocket for wax, keys, and other small items


Sizes

  • 3'10" x 21 x 0" (sleeve no side wall)
  • 4'2" x 23" x 3"
  • 4'8" x 24" x 3"
  • 5.0' x 27" x 3"
  • 5'6" x 28" x 4"
  • 6.0' x 30" x 4" | 3.6 lb (minimal weight variance between sizes)
  • 6'6" x 32" x 5"
  • 7'6" x 34" x 5"
  • 7'10" x 34" x 5"


Materials

  • Tarpaulin polyester skin
  • 600D nylon reinforcement
  • Corrosion-resistant YKK zipper

title: World Tour Surf Coffin V3
body_html:
When a one-board quiver isn't an option, our World Tour Surf Coffin is the answer. Capable of holding up to 3 surfboards—and all the extra gear needed—to make sure you don't miss a single session at your destination. This simple, lightweight and streamlined bag features a full-length zipper for easy access and packing. Board protection is at the highest level thanks to the durable external padding in conjunction with internal quiver dividers. We know that traveling with surfboards can be hectic and weight at the counter is important. With this in mind, we stripped away any of the unnecessary components, thereby reducing bag weight to make your strike mission check-in smooth and easy.

Features

  • Streamlined, lightweight, protective design
  • Padded, removable shoulder strap
  • Single reinforced haul handle
  • Quick-access exterior stash pocket
  • Exterior wet/dry compartment
  • TPU ventilation port
  • Full-length, heavy-duty zipper access
  • Transparent interior pockets for hardware and essentials
  • Internal gear stabilization tie downs
  • External ID pocket
  • Heavy-duty wheeled chassis


Sizes

  • 6'5" x 22" x 7" | 12.5 lb
  • 7'5" x 24" x 7" | 12.75 lb


Materials

  • 10mm PE foam bottom and sidewalls
  • 5mm PE foam top
  • TPU-coated ripstop for durability
  • 600D nylon ripstop shell offering abrasion and tear resistance
  • Heavy-duty YKK zippers

title: Driver Golf Bag
body_html:
Is there golfing in Dakhla? How about Cumbuco or Jeri? Who cares—the airlines won't know and that's all that matters since golf bags fly without any additional baggage fees on most airlines. Our stealthy, XL-wheeled Driver Golf Bag is designed with maximum padding, durability, and travel comfort in mind. Available in three sizes, the Driver accommodates everything from high-performance twin tips to ultra-long cable boards to micro kite-foil boards.

Features

  • Large, heavy-duty zip for easy packing
  • Burly haul handles
  • Heavy-duty XL wheels
  • Dual, external compression straps
  • Internal gear stabilization webbing straps
  • Quick-view identification window


Sizes

  • Small - 122CM x 48CM | 10.2 lb
  • Medium - 140CM x 42CM | 10.5 lb
  • Large - 165CM x 45.75CM | 10.8 lb


Materials

  • 600D nylon ripstop shell for abrasion and tear resistance
  • Heavy-duty YKK zippers
  • 1600D ballistic PVC
  • Nylon rolling chassis

title: RE Simple Wing Harness Line
body_html:
Made with minimal, simple, and strong Dyneema, the Simple Wing Harness Line can be used with wings that have pigtails or webbing attachment points. As well, it has a knot-hitch adjustment for tuning harness line length.

Features

  • Strong Dyneema rope
  • Knotted adjustment

title: RE Adjustable Wing Harness Line
body_html:
Those pigtails or webbing loops on your wing are there for a purpose! The Ride Engine Adjustable Wing Harness Line is easy to apply and transfer from wing to wing with the carabiner connection and features an easy pull-strap adjustment for reach and varied pigtail or webbing spread dimensions.

Features

  • Webbing pull tab adjustment
  • Quick connect and disconnect carabiner interface
  • PU-coated harness line

title: RE Adjustable Wing Boom Harness Line
body_html:
Optimized for wings that use a boom, the Ride Engine Adjustable Boom Harness Line is easy to install and transfer from wing to wing and allows infinite adjustment for the perfect reach and harness-hook interaction.

Features

  • Webbing pull tab adjustment
  • PU-coated harness line
  • Hitch boom attachment

title: Vinaka Wingsurf Hook Replacement
body_html: Replacement spreader bar hook for the Vinaka Harness.

title: Performance Neoprene Hoodie - Mist Green
body_html:
Minimalist, cold cutting perfection—the Performance Neoprene Hoodie is an ideal layering component that blocks the wind and adds insulation on those blustery days when an extra layer of neoprene will be the difference between staying out or heading home. With a performance pullover fit that eliminates unnecessary bagginess and a harness hook hole, the hoodie is 100% designed to be used on the water. For in-between sessions or as a session extender, this hoodie will become one of your favorites.

Features

• 1mm sustainably mined limestone neoprene
• Strategic Thermal Lock fleece lining keeps body heat in
• Durable flat-lock stitching
• Slim-fit hood with enough room to fit over a helmet
• Harness hook hole

Sizes
S, M, L, XL

title: Sky Hook Wing Vest V1
body_html:
Between the board and foil, sometimes wing foiling can be a full contact sport.

The Sky Hook Wing Foil impact vest is designed to protect you from any and all collisions. At the same time, it connects you to the power of your wing with The Nug harness line hook and to your board with an optional leash attachment point. Full torso padding protects from impact and the added flotation can help boost confidence in the water.

Features

  • Full torso padding for protection and moderate flotation
  • The Nug sliding harness line hook
  • D-ring board leash attachment point
  • 4-way high stretch limestone-based neoprene
  • Heavy-duty marine-grade YKK zipper
  • WARNING: Not a USCGA Life Vest

title: Womens Defender HF Vest
body_html:
Riding a hydrofoil on any type of surf craft in any condition can go sideways quickly, making an impact vest mandatory equipment for most foilers.

The Women's Defender HF Impact Vest has been designed with an optimized female fit to give you gladiator-level protection from a potentially injurious board or foil strike to the torso. The padding on the Defender HF Impact Vest is logically located to allow for unobtrusive paddling and smooth integration under a harness. Strategically placed internal impact-shell technology throughout the Defender HF Impact Vest shields your upper body from wayward foil points, board noses, and other scar-producing dangers so you can ride another day.

Features

  • Optimized design for all styles of foiling: kite, surf, windsurf, and wing
  • Internal impact-shell technology located in high-risk areas
  • 4-way-stretch limestone-based neoprene
  • Optimized women's fit
  • Heavy-duty YKK front zipper
  • WARNING: Not a USCGA Life Vest
